name: B-Horror: Subway
description:
A new case knocks at your door: strange events have been reported in the subway of the City of Buenos Aires.
Now it is up to you to find out what is causing them.

•Take on the role of a detective and dive into the depths of the subway tunnels.

•Screams and cries are heard from the depths.

•It's your mission to put an end to it.

GAMEPLAY

• Solve puzzles to escape.

• Use your flashlight to make your way in the underground.

• Run for your life.

Our Discord! :
